name: Sinister Sidekicks
description:
In an attempt to become a supervillain, you decide to hire a team of sidekicks to help you defeat any superhero who tries to stop you.

But you'll need to make sure you hire the right villains, otherwise they'll be squashed, lasered, or pulverized by the hero.

The more heroes you fight, the more knowledge you'll gain about which villains you need to recruit.

Background Music:

 Corona by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/
